description:
EXIF metadata viewing tool.


You can download ExifGlass for free.
To support the development of ExifGlass and gain access to future updates, consider purchasing it from the Microsoft Store.ExifGlass on Microsoft StoreDownloadsChangelog
- Updated the internal ExifTool.exe to v12.88
- Added Exit menu to Main Menu
- Added support for pressing ESC key to close the app & other windows
Full Changelog: https://github.com/d2phap/ExifGlass/compare/1.5.1.0...1.6.0.0
